name: Sushi Panic
description:
Made in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 51

Prepare and serve sushi to a new customer Every 10 Seconds. All while maintaining the kitchen!

each sushi dish is a different sequence, don’t mess up!

If a customer comes and there are no free seats, its GAME OVER!

WASD - Move

E - Use Prep Table (when things aren’t broken)

Hold F - Repair broken stuff!

Arrows - Cook sushi
